kv10.6:1.3: Maggasamaṅgī dvīhi phassehi dvīhi vedanāhi dvīhi saññāhi dvīhi cetanāhi dvīhi cittehi dvīhi saddhāhi dvīhi vīriyehi dvīhi satīhi dvīhi samādhīhi dvīhi paññāhi samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:2.3: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena phassena lokiyāya vedanāya lokiyāya paññāya lokiyāya cetanāya lokiyena cittena lokiyāya saddhāya lokiyena vīriyena lokiyāya satiyā lokiyena samādhinā lokiyāya paññāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:3.1: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sīlena samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:3.3: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca phassena samannāgato …pe…
kv10.6:3.4: lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca paññāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.1: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammāvācāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.3: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.5: maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammāvācāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.7: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsaṅkappena …pe…
kv10.6:5.10: lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsamādhinā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:6.1: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammākammantena …pe…
kv10.6:6.4: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:6.6: maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāājīvena samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:6.8: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsaṅkappena …pe…
kv10.6:6.9: lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsamādhinā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:7.8: tena hi maggasamaṅgī dvīhi sīlehi samannāgatoti.
